subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=1|rs=水00}}

# [[water]]
# [[body of water]]
# [[fluid]], [[liquid]]
# {{short for|lang=ja|水素|tr=suiso|nodot=1}}: [[hydrogen]]

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja}} {{wp|Water}}
{{ja-kanjitab|みず|yomi=k}} {{IPAfont|⟨mi1du⟩}} → *{{IPAchar|/mʲidu/}} → {{IPAchar|/mid͡zu/}} → {{IPAchar|/mizu/}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=みず|-}}, from {{inh|ja|jpx-pro|*mentu}}. Cognate with {{cog|jpx-ryu-pro|*mezu}} (whence {{cog|tkn|むぃずぃ|tr={{IPAchar|/mɨdzɨ/}}}}, {{cog|ryu|みじ|tr={{IPAchar|/midʑi/}} → miji}}, {{cog|mvi|みず|tr=midzɿ}} and {{cog|yoi|みん|tr={{IPAchar|/miɴ/}} → min}}). Also {{cog|zkg|買|tr=*me|t=[[river]], [[water]]}} is suspected to be a relative.{{cite-web|first=Alexander|last=Vovin|authorlink=Alexander Vovin|year=2010|title=上代日本語と古代・中世韓国語の「水」と「涙」|work=日韓言語学者会議 : 韓国語を通じた日韓両国の相互理解と共生|url=https://doctiktak.com/e7fbb28f49f91a656a039397a6b7e65b79623.html|page=115}} Possibly cognate with {{m|ja|瑞|tr={{IPAfont|⟨mi1du⟩}} → mizu||[[freshness]], [[youth]]}}.

subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|みず|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: * Most dictionaries [[proscribe]] historical ''-uwi'' readings such as {{ja-r|す.ゐ|hist=1}}, {{ja-r|ず.ゐ|hist=1}}, {{ja-r|つ.ゐ|hist=1}}, {{ja-r|ゆ.ゐ|hist=1}}, and {{ja-r|る.ゐ|hist=1}} as attested in many historical documents.
